traits.name: Fed by Darkness
traits.desc: A voidling in magical darkness at the start of its turn heals 5 hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The voidling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects except those that cause radiant damage.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The voidling's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, spell attack bonus +7). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: darkness, detect magic, fear 3/day each: eldritch blast (3 beams), black tentacles 1/day each: phantasmal force, reverse gravity

traits.name: Natural Invisibility
traits.desc: A voidling in complete darkness is considered invisible to creatures that rely on normal vision or darkvision.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Burst (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The voidling releases a burst of necrotic energy in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on itself. Those in the area take 35 (10d6) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw.
